summary: Diff adds Vite env typings and an example .env file, plus updates to frontend documentation/summaries and project_state.json. There is no clear evidence of changes that would ensure a successful end-to-end IC build+deploy or address deterministic causes of intermittent deploy failures (e.g., dfx config, canister build/deploy scripts, dependency pinning).

missing_requirements.requirement: Re-run the full build and deployment of the existing Finance Tracker app (Draft Version 2) to production on the Internet Computer, ensuring the process completes successfully end-to-end (frontend build, canister build, and deploy), and produce a live/public app URL as the deployment result.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows only added frontend env typing/example env file and documentation/project state changes; it does not show any deploy execution output, canister deployment changes, or configuration/scripts that would demonstrate an end-to-end successful deploy and resulting public URL.

missing_requirements.requirement: Identify and resolve deterministic, project-level causes of intermittent build/deploy failure so consecutive deployments can be executed reliably (two consecutive runs succeed without manual intervention).
missing_requirements.reason: No concrete build/deploy stabilization changes are evidenced (e.g., lockfile/dependency pinning, dfx.json/canister settings, CI scripts, build pipeline fixes, backend compilation fixes). The changes shown are primarily env typing/example env and documentation/state tracking.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduce new environment variables and related typing for a public app URL sharing feature (VITE_PUBLIC_APP_URL).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on successful/repeatable deployment and stabilizing build/deploy failures; it does not request adding or documenting new user-facing/share-related configuration.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduce configurable Internet Identity provider URL via VITE_II_URL environment variable and document it.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists changing authentication away from Internet Identity as a non-goal and does not request adding configuration options for the II provider URL; this is an unrequested capability based on the diff summary.
